documents.document: @TransLink Thanks. Is there any chance of increasing frequency anytime soon? Or is there a shortage of rolling stock?
@TransLink passed up by 2 skytrains every morning at Holdom IB since Monday. What's the current frequency at for the trains?
@TransLink Just passed by Nanaimo, don't think the passengers on the OB platform are aware that the trains are not on that side.
@TransLink ah. So from Joyce to Nanaimo on the IB track, then back onto the OB track?
@TransLink Is the problem train on the IB or OB track?
@TransLink got passed up by a Skytrain OB Holdom Station... We need longer trains/more frequent trains!
@StaplesCanada I was told you don't follow the Scanning Code of Practice at a store, is that true?
MVA Hastings & Salisbury affecting both directions. @TransLink @NEWS1130Traffic
@TransLink Thanks for letting me know, it wasn't communicated to us on board.
@translink Transit Police kicked everyone off the 145 at stop 51861, and the bus now pulled from the stop...
@TransLink One of your STA's was operating the train IB between Lake City and ProD, hard braked about 5 times & everyone flew from seats
@TransLink passed up on 160 at stop 51852 about 10 minutes ago
When the STA's decide to do manual operation and you miss your bus, next one is in an hour... #thankstranslink @TransLink
What if the Mark 2 Skytrain cars had perimeter seating instead of directional seats? Larger Capacity, right? #transitthoughts @TransLink
@NEWS1130Traffic You're welcome!
MVA Bewickie at Larson in North Vancouver. NB Bewickie blocked. Waiting on tow trucks. @NEWS1130Traffic @AM730Traffic
@lottomax Hey, will the track be released?
@TransLink Not until I reached the next stop, and it was pouring rain and dark out.
@TransLink Driver of S330 wasn't aware about doing request stops?
@TransLink passed up by 3 555 buses at Lougheed Station.. All the buses are leaving full!
@TransLink Is it the IB or OB track affected?
@TransLink vomit on the top of escalator 3 at Commercial Broadway.
@TransLink reported already, ran into the same driver on the 144 (9401).
@translink passed up at stop 52867 on 110 (9414) about 3 minutes ago. Driver was also very rude about the situation.
@TransLink I got off the train already. https://t.co/GV1MGol8vx
@TransLink intoxicated male onboard car 337
The school drills helped a lot. #earthquake
@yvrairport Flew out to TPE this summer #YVR20Million
@TransLink passed up at Stop 50875 with 15 other people.

When you wait for the bus and power goes out #bcstorm
@TimmyC62 that's what I thought lol
@translink The bus was full standing.
@translink Got passed up at Stop 52851 (136 Lougheed) 2 minutes ago.
Most people don't realize how important something is until its gone.
@translink passed up on 136 Brentwood at Stop 59316 2 minutes ago, full bus.
@translink I got on, but some other passengers aren't so lucky. The bus is full.
@translink Where is the 136 Special from stop 52846?
Can't cook food. Resorted to Nutella and Pretzels. #bcstorm
